name: Dual The Game
description:
Mantis Is An Evil Du Person That Decided To Take Over The World Because Of No One Realizing How Many Inventions He Made That Could Help The World So He Thought If I Rule The World Then People Will Know That I Made The Great Inventions But Then He Thought Why Should Only Praise His Work How About Praise Him Or How About Making Him A King? Dual Will Go Along And Foil His Plans And Mantis Will Try Again. His Kind Is Du People But He Claims That He Left That Kind And Instead Says He Is Part Of The Mantis Kind.

Shop

The Place Where You Can Buy Skins Which Can Later Be Worn By Dual. Like Any Store You Will Have To Pay But Instead Of Cash You Pay Du Coins.

Du Coins

The Items The Du People Refer To As Cash And Which Du People Use To Buy Thing From Sellers. The Shop Uses Du Coins As The Payment Method. Some Skins May Require A Bigger Amount Of Du Coins. The Higher The Price The Better It Is!
